scripts.copy: cp -r ./public/v/dev ./public/v/prev/${npm_package_version} && echo ${npm_package_version} > ./public/v/prev/${npm_package_version}/version.txt && rm -rf ./public/v/current && cp -r ./public/v/prev/${npm_package_version} ./public/v/current && firebase deploy
scripts.commit: git add . && git commit -m v${npm_package_version} && git push origin v${npm_package_version}
scripts.release: standard-version && npm run copy && npm run commit
